basic.floral_language:
Myosotis sylvatica 
Floriography: sincerity, loyalty, warmth 
Myosotis sylvatica forms a beautiful blue flower, like a small curved umbrella. Flowers are small delicate, blooming just as its name implies, can continue for a long time, enough to be remembered in deep heart. Moreover, Myosotis sylvatica flowers do not fall after dying, can be made chic dried flower. 
Myosotis sylvatica like sunshine, blooming from May to July, ornamental period lasts three to four weeks
basic.blooming: Flowering period May-July, viewing period 3-4 weeks
basic.color: Flower color blue, purple, white, yellow

maintenance.soil: Likes slightly alkaline soil, may use peat adding a small amount of lime or baking soda,
maintenance.sunlight: Likes sunshine, but avoid very strong sunlight
maintenance.watering: Moderately resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased and dead leaves timely
